content: As an AI language model, I don't have the capability to listen to music. However, I'm aware that Lil Wayne and 2 Chainz collaborated on the song "Bounce" in 2016. The song features a high-energy beat and catchy lyrics, typical of both artists' styles. The song was released as a single in anticipation of their collaborative album "Collegrove," which was released shortly after. The song has been well-received by fans and showcases both artists' chemistry and skillful delivery.
